intro: Step into the brand new version of the enchanting world of Yui, Shirayuki, and Etsuko.
description:
Those captivating girls will invite you to take part in the most alluring puzzle experience available on Nintendo Switch™.


ANIME AS AN ART FORM
Immerse yourself in the beautiful anime-inspired art of Hentai Girls, where you'll get to know these stunning and intriguing women. Solve their puzzles to advance through their stories, all while enjoying their charming company.


CHALLENGING PROGRESSION
While the gameplay starts off simple, the challenges grow as you move forward. Stay focused – their enticing outfits might be distracting.


KEY FEATURES:
- Stunning hand-drawn Hentai illustrations
- Soothing background music
- Easy-to-learn gameplay with increasing difficulty
- A unique and special concept
